607-661. aññāṇāti
aññāṇahetu, saccapaṭicchādakasammohahetūti attho| aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ ‘‘aññāṇenā’’ti vuttaṃ| sabbānīti ‘‘aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā’’tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni, pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā|
